pkgmetadata.longdescription: The SVR Path Algorithm // Computes the entire solution paths for Support Vector Regression(SVR) with respect to the regularization parameter, lambda and epsilon in epsilon- intensive loss function, efficiently. We call each path algorithm svrpath and epspath. See Wang, G. et al (2008) doi:10.1109/TNN.2008.2002077 for details regarding the method.
